K10D0205_H0206:142a-1: a'arya n'a ga ra aa ba la ma bi k'a n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10D0205_H0206:142a-3: 'phags pa grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10D0205_H0206:142a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0205_H0206:142a-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10D0205_H0206:142a-7: bcom ldan 'das mnyam yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed
K10D0205_H0206:142a-8: kyi tshal mngon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab
K10D0205_H0206:142a-25: dge ba snyen ma rnams kyis bkur stir byas /
K10D0205_H0206:142b-0: mchod @142b cing rjed de padma chus ma gos pa bzhin du bzhugs so //
K10D0205_H0206:142b-1: de nas de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de
K10D0205_H0206:142b-2: bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i phyir ston zla tha
K10D0205_H0206:142b-3: chung zla ba nya ba'i tshes bco lnga la /
K10D0205_H0206:142b-4: 'bru mar gyis zangs po che stong bkang ste dngar
K10D0205_H0206:142b-5: nas mar me spar ba'i 'od kyis khor khor yug
K10D0205_H0206:142b-6: tu dpag tshad bzhir snang bas khyab par byas so
K10D0205_H0206:142b-7: // de nas yang de'i tshe mnyan yod kyi grong
K10D0205_H0206:142b-8: khyer chen po na dga' byed ma zhes bya ba
K10D0205_H0206:142b-9: grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba zhig 'dug go /
K10D0205_H0206:142b-10: des 'bru mar sran gre'u dang sbyar ba nyos nas
K10D0205_H0206:142b-11: zhag bzhi kha 'tshos te nyam chung bar gyur to
K10D0205_H0206:142b-12: // de nas 'bru mar de khyer te rgyal bu
K10D0205_H0206:142b-13: rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas khyim gyi nang
K10D0205_H0206:142b-14: logs su mar me spar te bzhag nas 'di ltar
K10D0205_H0206:142b-16: bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i dus
K10D0205_H0206:142b-17: na ji ltar da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa
K10D0205_H0206:142b-18: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
K10D0205_H0206:142b-19: ji lta ba bzhin du bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i
K10D0205_H0206:142b-20: dus na ston par gyur te chos ston par gyur
K10D0205_H0206:142b-21: cig / dge 'dun yang sdud par gyur cig ces byas so //
K10D0205_H0206:142b-23: gal te bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas
K10D0205_H0206:142b-24: su 'gyur ba zhig na mar me 'di bdag phyir
K10D0205_H0206:142b-25: ma 'ongs kyi bar du 'bar bar gyur cig ces
K10D0205_H0206:142b-26: byas nas mar me de spar te grong khyer du
K10D0205_H0206:143a-1: me de'i 'od zer kyis dzambu'i gling thams cad snang
K10D0205_H0206:143a-2: bar gyur te nam nangs kyi bar du'ang mar me
K10D0205_H0206:143a-3: de ma shi'o // de nas tshe dang ldan pa
K10D0205_H0206:143a-4: moonggal gyi bu chen pos chos gos kyi mtha' mas
K10D0205_H0206:143a-5: mar me de gsad par byas nas gsad par ma
K10D0205_H0206:143a-6: de ma shi'o // nus so // de nas tshe
K10D0205_H0206:143a-7: dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen pos rnam par
K10D0205_H0206:143a-8: 'thor rlung gis gsad par byas kyang gsad par ma
K10D0205_H0206:143a-9: de ma shi'o // nus so // nus so //
K10D0205_H0206:143a-10: de nas tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen
K10D0205_H0206:143a-11: pos tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'dug nas stong gsum
K10D0205_H0206:143a-12: 'dir shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi char gyi rgyun
K10D0205_H0206:143a-13: dbab par byin gyis brlabs te mar me de yi
K10D0205_H0206:143a-14: steng du btang yang gsad par ma nus so //
K10D0205_H0206:143a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0205_H0206:143a-18: mar me 'di ni byang chub kyi sems kyis sbar ba yin la /
K10D0205_H0206:143a-19: byang chub kyi sems ni nyan thos kyis zil gyis mnan par mi nus so //
K10D0205_H0206:143a-21: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ni nyan thos dang /
K10D0205_H0206:143a-22: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zil gyis mnan du med pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0205_H0206:143a-23: de nas re zhig na bud med de nyi ma
K10D0205_H0206:143a-24: shar te grong khyer nas phyir 'ongs nas des mar
K10D0205_H0206:143a-25: me de shin tu 'bar ba mthong ba dang /
K10D0205_H0206:143a-26: des mchog tu dga' ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to //
K10D0205_H0206:143a-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K10D0205_H0206:143b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan @143b 'das rnams kyi chos nyid ni 'di yin te /
K10D0205_H0206:143b-1: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa
K10D0205_H0206:143b-2: mdzad pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
K10D0205_H0206:143b-3: kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du
K10D0205_H0206:143b-11: dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung bar gyur te /
K10D0205_H0206:143b-12: 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag
K10D0205_H0206:143b-13: snang bas khyab par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten
K10D0205_H0206:143b-16: nyi ma'i 'od kyang zil gyis mnan nas yang slar log ste /
K10D0205_H0206:143b-17: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas
K10D0205_H0206:143b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du nub par
K10D0205_H0206:143b-19: gyur to // de nas 'od zer de dag gis
K10D0205_H0206:143b-20: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te
K10D0205_H0206:143b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang
K10D0205_H0206:143b-22: gyur to // bar gyur to // de nas bcom
K10D0205_H0206:143b-23: ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
K10D0205_H0206:143b-24: tshigs su bcad de gsol pa //
K10D0205_H0206:143b-25: rgyal mchog rnam par 'dren pa gang zag mchog /
K10D0205_H0206:143b-26: rgyu med par ni 'dzum pa mi mdzad na //
K10D0205_H0206:143b-27: ci yi rkyen gyis zhal ni 'dzum mdzad pa //
K10D0205_H0206:143b-28: 'jig rten phan pa thugs brtses bdag la gsungs //
K10D0205_H0206:143b-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0205_H0206:143b-31: grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba 'di bskal pa nyi shu
K10D0205_H0206:143b-32: rtsa brgyad kyi bar du ngan 'gro log par ltung
K10D0205_H0206:144a-2: mi'i phun sum tshogs pa dag nyams su myong nas
K10D0205_H0206:144a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
K10D0205_H0206:144a-4: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu snang ba zhes bya
K10D0205_H0206:144a-5: bar 'gyur ro // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
K10D0205_H0206:144a-6: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal
K10D0205_H0206:144a-7: bar 'gyur ro // to // stobs bcu ldan pa mchod phyir zangs chen phrag stong gsal rgyal gyis //
K10D0205_H0206:144a-8: mar me bzang po sbar bas dpag tshad bzhir ni kun tu snang //
K10D0205_H0206:144a-9: grong khyer 'tsho ba'i 'bru mar sran ma gre'u sbyar spar ba yis //
K10D0205_H0206:144a-10: 'dzam gling snang bas khyab gyur de ni byang chub sems kyi mthus //
K10D0205_H0206:144a-11: moonggal gyis ni mar me gsad 'dod rdzu 'phrul rgya chen byas //
K10D0205_H0206:144a-12: rnam par 'thor ba'i rlung gi shugs btang gsad par yod ma nus //
K10D0205_H0206:144a-13: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'dug nas chu rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam //
K10D0205_H0206:144a-14: phab kyang gsad par ma nus mar me nyi ma'i 'od bzhin snang //
K10D0205_H0206:144a-15: de ni zhag bzhi kha 'tshos rgyal byed dga' ba'i tshal du 'ongs //
K10D0205_H0206:144a-16: dga' ba'i sems kyis bde gshegs zhabs la phyag byas thal sbyar 'dug /
K10D0205_H0206:144a-17: mnyam med 'dzum pa mdzad pas kun dga' bo yang rab dga' nas //
K10D0205_H0206:144a-18: gzi brjid mtha' yas 'dzum mdzad 'di yi 'bras bu ji 'dra gsungs //
K10D0205_H0206:144a-19: dga' byed 'di ni bskal pa nyi shu brgyad na rgyal bar 'gyur //
K10D0205_H0206:144a-20: rang 'byung kun snang zhes bya 'od kyis stong chen bzhi snang byed //
K10D0205_H0206:144b-0: ma 'ongs dus na bde bar @144b gshegs pa bye ba mchod par 'gyur //
K10D0205_H0206:144b-1: de ni kun tu 'khor los bsgyur 'gyur rgyal rnams bkur stir byed //
K10D0205_H0206:144b-2: sangs rgyas rtogs pa brjod pa yi ni dad rnams rab dga' byed //
K10D0205_H0206:144b-3: skye bo mkhas pa dag gis de thos sems kyang rab tu dga'//
K10D0205_H0206:144b-4: de ltar rgyal ba bsam yas stobs bcu'i chos kyang bsam mi khyab //
K10D0205_H0206:144b-5: dga' ba bskyed na rnam smin mtshungs med bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur //
K10D0205_H0206:144b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10D0205_H0206:144b-7: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K10D0205_H0206:144b-8: grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba de dang /
K10D0205_H0206:144b-9: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K10D0205_H0206:144b-14: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K10D0205_H0206:144b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10D0205_H0206:144b-16: 'phags pa grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10D0205_H0206:144b-17: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzny'a na garbha dang /
K10D0205_H0206:144b-18: lo ts'a ba bande klu'i dbang pos bsgyur ba /
K10D0205_H0206:144b-19: rgya gar gyi mkhan po pi [?] dya ka ra sidha dang /
